channel.title: [PI] RSPS Freezes when typing [PI]
channel.description:
So basically whenever someone types the screen freezes, BUT if you are a administrator or owner you don't freeze when typing?
Does anyone know how I can fix this so players can type without the screen freezes?
Thank you!
*It's a PI, the source is TorvaPkz v2

item.title: [PI] RSPS Freezes when typing [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Any errors throw when they are kicked in the run cmd? Or something in like chat.java that checks if your are rights 1 and 0 and kicks you.

Read full topic
